description: Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez aims to lift Spain's strict virus lockdown in four phases from 4 May.
title: Coronavirus: Spain plans return to 'new normal' by end of June
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain plans return to 'new normal' by end of June - BBC News
maintext: There are signs the epidemic is now in decline, however. On Tuesday Spain's daily toll of registered virus deaths was 301, according to its health ministry, compared to a high of 950 in early April. The number of new infections also fell to 1,308 on Tuesday, its lowest level since Spain declared a state of alarm on 14 March.
